metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v7.15.0 - New: Validation Gate Pattern enforces orchestrate.sh execution with blocking steps, validation gates, imperative language (100% compliance, 4x faster, 70% token savings). All workflow skills now enforce multi-AI execution. BREAKING: Requires Claude Code v2.1.16+. Commands '/octo:*'. Run /octo:setup.
